  <style>
   /* Gulp b2b must be run in order for changes to this file to be relected in
   breakpoints.json. This task is part of the build and also can be run independently */
/*! normalize.css v8.0.1 | MIT License | github.com/necolas/normalize.css | added 03/01/19 */
/* stylelint-disable */
/* Document
   ========================================================================== */
/**
 * 1. Correct the line height in all browsers.
 * 2. Prevent adjustments of font size after orientation changes in iOS.
 */
html {
  line-height: 1.15;
  /* 1 */
  -webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;
  /* 2 */ }

/* Sections
   ========================================================================== */
/**
 * Remove the margin in all browsers.
 */
body {
  margin: 0; }

/**
 * Render the `main` element consistently in IE.
 */
main {
  display: block; }

/**
 * Correct the font size and margin on `h1` elements within `section` and
 * `article` contexts in Chrome, Firefox, and Safari.
 */
h1 {
  font-size: 2em;
  margin: 0.67em 0; }

/* Grouping content
   ========================================================================== */
/**
 * 1. Add the correct box sizing in Firefox.
 * 2. Show the overflow in Edge and IE.
 */
hr {
  -webkit-box-sizing: content-box;
          box-sizing: content-box;
  /* 1 */
  height: 0;
  /* 1 */
  overflow: visible;
  /* 2 */ }

/**
 * 1. Correct the inheritance and scaling of font size in all browsers.
 * 2. Correct the odd `em` font sizing in all browsers.
 */
pre {
  font-family: monospace, monospace;
  /* 1 */
  font-size: 1em;
  /* 2 */ }

/* Text-level semantics
   ========================================================================== */
/**
 * Remove the gray background on active links in IE 10.
 */
a {
  background-color: transparent; }

/**
 * 1. Remove the bottom border in Chrome 57-
 * 2. Add the correct text decoration in Chrome, Edge, IE, Opera, and Safari.
 */
abbr[title] {
  border-bottom: none;
  /* 1 */
  text-decoration: underline;
  /* 2 */
  -webkit-text-decoration: underline dotted;
          text-decoration: underline dotted;
  /* 2 */ }

/**
 * Add the correct font weight in Chrome, Edge, and Safari.
 */
b,
strong {
  font-weight: bolder; }

/**
 * 1. Correct the inheritance and scaling of font size in all browsers.
 * 2. Correct the odd `em` font sizing in all browsers.
 */
code,
kbd,
samp {
  font-family: monospace, monospace;
  /* 1 */
  font-size: 1em;
  /* 2 */ }

/**
 * Add the correct font size in all browsers.
 */
small {
  font-size: 80%; }

/**
 * Prevent `sub` and `sup` elements from affecting the line height in
 * all browsers.
 */
sub,
sup {
  font-size: 75%;
  line-height: 0;
  position: relative;
  vertical-align: baseline; }

sub {
  bottom: -0.25em; }

sup {
  top: -0.5em; }

/* Embedded content
   ========================================================================== */
/**
 * Remove the border on images inside links in IE 10.
 */
img {
  border-style: none; }

/* Forms
   ========================================================================== */
/**
 * 1. Change the font styles in all browsers.
 * 2. Remove the margin in Firefox and Safari.
 */
button,
input,
optgroup,
select,
textarea {
  font-family: inherit;
  /* 1 */
  font-size: 100%;
  /* 1 */
  line-height: 1.15;
  /* 1 */
  margin: 0;
  /* 2 */ }

/**
 * Show the overflow in IE.
 * 1. Show the overflow in Edge.
 */
button,
input {
  /* 1 */
  overflow: visible; }

/**
 * Remove the inheritance of text transform in Edge, Firefox, and IE.
 * 1. Remove the inheritance of text transform in Firefox.
 */
button,
select {
  /* 1 */
  text-transform: none; }

/**
 * Remove the inner border and padding in Firefox.
 */
button::-moz-focus-inner,
[type="button"]::-moz-focus-inner,
[type="reset"]::-moz-focus-inner,
[type="submit"]::-moz-focus-inner {
  border-style: none;
  padding: 0; }

/**
 * Restore the focus styles unset by the previous rule.
 */
button:-moz-focusring,
[type="button"]:-moz-focusring,
[type="reset"]:-moz-focusring,
[type="submit"]:-moz-focusring {
  outline: 1px dotted ButtonText; }

/**
 * Correct the padding in Firefox.
 */
fieldset {
  padding: 0.35em 0.75em 0.625em; }

/**
 * 1. Correct the text wrapping in Edge and IE.
 * 2. Correct the color inheritance from `fieldset` elements in IE.
 * 3. Remove the padding so developers are not caught out when they zero out
 *    `fieldset` elements in all browsers.
 */
legend {
  -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
          box-sizing: border-box;
  /* 1 */
  color: inherit;
  /* 2 */
  display: table;
  /* 1 */
  max-width: 100%;
  /* 1 */
  padding: 0;
  /* 3 */
  white-space: normal;
  /* 1 */ }

/**
 * Add the correct vertical alignment in Chrome, Firefox, and Opera.
 */
progress {
  vertical-align: baseline; }

/**
 * Remove the default vertical scrollbar in IE 10+.
 */
textarea {
  overflow: auto; }

/**
 * 1. Add the correct box sizing in IE 10.
 * 2. Remove the padding in IE 10.
 */
[type="checkbox"],
[type="radio"] {
  -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
          box-sizing: border-box;
  /* 1 */
  padding: 0;
  /* 2 */ }

/**
 * Correct the cursor style of increment and decrement buttons in Chrome.
 */
[type="number"]::-webkit-inner-spin-button,
[type="number"]::-webkit-outer-spin-button {
  height: auto; }

/**
 * 1. Correct the odd appearance in Chrome and Safari.
 * 2. Correct the outline style in Safari.
 */
[type="search"] {
  -webkit-appearance: textfield;
  /* 1 */
  outline-offset: -2px;
  /* 2 */ }

/**
 * Remove the inner padding in Chrome and Safari on macOS.
 */
[type="search"]::-webkit-search-decoration {
  -webkit-appearance: none; }

/**
 * 1. Correct the inability to style clickable types in iOS and Safari.
 * 2. Change font properties to `inherit` in Safari.
 */
::-webkit-file-upload-button {
  -webkit-appearance: button;
  /* 1 */
  font: inherit;
  /* 2 */ }

/* Interactive
   ========================================================================== */
/*
 * Add the correct display in Edge, IE 10+, and Firefox.
 */
details {
  display: block; }

/*
 * Add the correct display in all browsers.
 */
summary {
  display: list-item; }

/* Misc
   ========================================================================== */
/**
 * Add the correct display in IE 10+.
 */
template {
  display: none; }

/**
 * Add the correct display in IE 10.
 */
[hidden] {
  display: none; }

/* stylelint-enable */
gpt-placeholder,
gpt-ad {
  display: block;
  text-align: center; }

gpt-sizeset {
  display: none; }

gpt-ad:not(.ad-loaded) > div {
  display: none; }

address {
  font-style: normal; }

a {
  color: #000;
  text-decoration: none;
  -webkit-transition: all 150ms;
  transition: all 150ms; }
  a:hover {
    -webkit-transition: all 300ms;
    transition: all 300ms; }

blockquote {
  border-left: 1px solid #9B9B9B;
  margin: 0 0 0 16px;
  padding-left: 16px; }
  @media (min-width: 576px) {
    blockquote {
      padding-left: 32px;
      margin: 0 0 0 32px; } }
  blockquote p {
    margin: 0; }

/* Gulp b2b must be run in order for changes to this file to be relected in
   breakpoints.json. This task is part of the build and also can be run independently */
body {
  font-variant-numeric: lining-nums;
  font-weight: 400;
  font-size: 14.8px;
  font-family: Georgia, serif;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  line-height: 1.5;
  margin: 0; }
  .no-js body,
  .fonts-loaded body {
    font-size: 19.8px; }
  .no-js body,
  .fonts-loaded body {
    font-family: AGaramondPro, "Adobe Garamond Pro", Garamond, Georgia, serif;
    line-height: 1.125; }

figure {
  margin: 0; }

hr {
  background: #d3dce6;
  border: 0;
  height: 1px; }

html {
  -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
          box-sizing: border-box; }
  html *, html *::before, html *::after {
    -webkit-box-sizing: inherit;
            box-sizing: inherit; }

img {
  display: inline-block;
  height: auto;
  max-width: 100%; }

picture {
  display: block; }

small {
  display: inline-block;
  font-size: 16px; }

/* Gulp b2b must be run in order for changes to this file to be relected in
   breakpoints.json. This task is part of the build and also can be run independently */
.o-credit {
  font-size: 11px;
  font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Segoe UI, Arial, sans-serif;
  color: #5e6a74;
  line-height: 1.5; }
  .no-js .o-credit,
  .fonts-loaded .o-credit {
    font-family: "Graphik", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Segoe UI, Arial, sans-serif; }
  .o-credit a {
    color: #5e6a74;
    text-decoration: underline;
    -webkit-text-decoration-skip: ink;
            text-decoration-skip: ink;
    text-decoration-skip-ink: auto; }

.o-credit__attribution {
  font-size: 10px;
  text-transform: uppercase; }

.o-credit__caption + .o-credit__attribution::before {
  content: '\00a0\00a0('; }

.o-credit__caption + .o-credit__attribution::after {
  content: ')'; }

.o-hed {
  margin: 0; }

.o-media {
  height: 0;
  position: relative; }

.o-media--16x9 {
  padding-bottom: 56.25%; }

.o-media--3x2 {
  padding-bottom: 66.66667%; }

.o-media__object {
  display: block;
  height: 100%;
  position: absolute;
  width: 100%; }

.o-media__img {
  width: 100%; }

.o-media__credit {
  bottom: -1.75em;
  color: #5e6a74;
  font-family: "Graphik", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Segoe UI, Arial, sans-serif;
  font-size: 8px;
  line-height: 1;
  max-width: 100%;
  overflow: hidden;
  position: absolute;
  right: 0;
  text-align: right;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  white-space: nowrap; }
  .o-media__credit:hover {
    overflow: visible; }

.o-meta {
  font-family: "Graphik", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Segoe UI, Arial, sans-serif;
  font-size: 11px;
  letter-spacing: 1px;
  line-height: 1.125;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  white-space: normal; }

.o-meta__date {
  color: #5e6a74;
  font-size: 11px;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  white-space: nowrap; }
  .o-meta__date:not(:last-child) {
    margin-right: 8px; }

.o-meta__city {
  color: #5e6a74; }

.o-meta__byline {
  display: inline-block;
  font-weight: 600;
  list-style-type: none;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0; }
  .o-meta__byline:not(:last-child) {
    margin-right: 8px; }

.o-meta__author {
  display: inline; }
  .o-meta__author > a {
    color: #000; }
  .o-meta__author:not(:last-child) a::after {
    content: ', '; }
  .o-meta__author:first-child:nth-last-child(2) a::after {
    content: ''; }
  .o-meta__author:not(:first-child):last-child::before {
    content: ' and '; }

.c-ad-container {
  max-width: 100%;
  text-align: center; }

.c-ad-container--river {
  margin-bottom: 24px; }
  @media (min-width: 576px) {
    .c-ad-container--river {
      margin-bottom: 32px; } }

.c-ad-container--shaded {
  background: #eee; }
  .c-ad-container--shaded gpt-ad.ad-loaded {
    padding: 16px 32px; }

.c-ad-container--lead-story {
  -ms-flex-preferred-size: 100%;
      flex-basis: 100%;
  -ms-flex-wrap: wrap;
      flex-wrap: wrap;
  -webkit-box-pack: center;
      -ms-flex-pack: center;
          justify-content: center;
  margin-bottom: 0;
  -webkit-box-ordinal-group: 1000;
      -ms-flex-order: 999;
          order: 999; }
  @media (min-width: 576px) {
    .c-ad-container--lead-story {
      margin: 16px 0; } }
  @media (min-width: 784px) {
    .c-ad-container--lead-story {
      display: none; } }

.c-ad {
  margin: 0 auto; }
  .c-ad.ad-loaded::before {
    content: 'Advertisement';
    display: block;
    font-family: "Graphik", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Segoe UI, Arial, sans-serif;
    font-size: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 8px;
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    width: 100%; }

.c-ad-logo {
  display: inline-block;
  text-align: left; }
  .c-ad-logo.ad-loaded::before {
    font-size: 11px;
    font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Segoe UI, Arial, sans-serif;
    font-weight: 600;
    letter-spacing: 1px;
    line-height: 1.4;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    color: #999;
    content: attr(data-prefix);
    display: block;
    margin-bottom: 4px; }
    .no-js .c-ad-logo.ad-loaded::before,
    .fonts-loaded .c-ad-logo.ad-loaded::before {
      font-family: "Graphik", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Segoe UI, Arial, sans-serif; }

      -ms-flex-align: center;

      max-width: none;
      width: 100%; } }

    color: #000;
    text-decoration: none;
    height: 16px; }

  display: -webkit-box;

      -ms-flex-pack: justify;
          justify-content: space-between;

  margin: 0 auto;
  max-width: 1280px;

  cursor: pointer; }

    .c-expanded-nav-print__img-link {
      margin-right: 16px; } }

      content: normal; } }

  .c-latest-video:not(:last-child) {
    margin-right: 16px; }
  @media (min-width: 576px) {
    .c-latest-video {
      -ms-flex-preferred-size: calc(50% - 0px);
          flex-basis: calc(50% - 0px);
      width: auto; }
      .c-latest-video:nth-child(2) {
        margin-right: 0; }
      .c-latest-video:nth-child(n+3) {
        display: none; } }
  @media (min-width: 784px) {
    .c-latest-video {
      -ms-flex-preferred-size: auto;
          flex-basis: auto; }
      .c-latest-video:nth-child(1) {
        margin-bottom: 8px;
        margin-right: 0; } }

  display: -webkit-inline-box;
  display: -ms-inline-flexbox;
  display: inline-flex;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0 16px; }
  @media (min-width: 576px) {
    .c-latest-video__list {
      display: -webkit-box;

          -ms-flex-direction: column;
              flex-direction: column; } }

/* stylelint-disable max-nesting-depth */
/*!
 * Hamburgers
 * @description Tasty CSS-animated hamburgers
 * @author Jonathan Suh @jonsuh
 * @site https://jonsuh.com/hamburgers
 * @link https://github.com/jonsuh/hamburgers
 */
.hamburger {
  display: inline-block;
  cursor: pointer;
  position: relative;
  -webkit-transition-property: opacity, -webkit-filter;
  transition-property: opacity, -webkit-filter;
  transition-property: opacity, filter;
  transition-property: opacity, filter, -webkit-filter;
  -webkit-transition-duration: 0.15s;
          transition-duration: 0.15s;
  -webkit-transition-timing-function: linear;
          transition-timing-function: linear; }
  .hamburger:hover {
    opacity: 0.7; }
  .hamburger.is-active:hover {
    opacity: 0.7; }
  .hamburger.is-active .hamburger-inner,
  .hamburger.is-active .hamburger-inner::before,
  .hamburger.is-active .hamburger-inner::after {
    background-color: #e7131a; }

.hamburger-box {
  width: 20px;
  height: 15px;
  display: inline-block;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden; }

.hamburger-inner {
  display: block;
  top: 50%;
  margin-top: -0.5px; }
  .hamburger-inner, .hamburger-inner::before, .hamburger-inner::after {
    width: 20px;
    height: 1px;
    background-color: #000;
    border-radius: 4px;
    position: absolute;
    -webkit-transition-property: -webkit-transform;
    transition-property: -webkit-transform;
    transition-property: transform;
    transition-property: transform, -webkit-transform;
    -webkit-transition-duration: 0.15s;
            transition-duration: 0.15s;
    -webkit-transition-timing-function: ease;
            transition-timing-function: ease; }
  .hamburger-inner::before, .hamburger-inner::after {
    content: '';
    display: block; }
  .hamburger-inner::before {
    top: -7px; }
  .hamburger-inner::after {
    bottom: -7px; }

/*
   * Spin
   */
.hamburger--spin .hamburger-inner {
  -webkit-transition-duration: 0.22s;
          transition-duration: 0.22s;
  -webkit-transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.55, 0.055, 0.675, 0.19);
          transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.55, 0.055, 0.675, 0.19); }
  .hamburger--spin .hamburger-inner::before {
    -webkit-transition: top 0.1s 0.25s ease-in, opacity 0.1s ease-in;
    transition: top 0.1s 0.25s ease-in, opacity 0.1s ease-in; }
  .hamburger--spin .hamburger-inner::after {
    -webkit-transition: bottom 0.1s 0.25s ease-in, -webkit-transform 0.22s cubic-bezier(0.55, 0.055, 0.675, 0.19);
    transition: bottom 0.1s 0.25s ease-in, -webkit-transform 0.22s cubic-bezier(0.55, 0.055, 0.675, 0.19);
    transition: bottom 0.1s 0.25s ease-in, transform 0.22s cubic-bezier(0.55, 0.055, 0.675, 0.19);
    transition: bottom 0.1s 0.25s ease-in, transform 0.22s cubic-bezier(0.55, 0.055, 0.675, 0.19), -webkit-transform 0.22s cubic-bezier(0.55, 0.055, 0.675, 0.19); }

.hamburger--spin.is-active .hamburger-inner {
  -webkit-transform: rotate(225deg);
          transform: rotate(225deg);
  -webkit-transition-delay: 0.12s;
          transition-delay: 0.12s;
  -webkit-transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1);
          transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1); }
  .hamburger--spin.is-active .hamburger-inner::before {
    top: 0;
    opacity: 0;
    -webkit-transition: top 0.1s ease-out, opacity 0.1s 0.12s ease-out;
    transition: top 0.1s ease-out, opacity 0.1s 0.12s ease-out; }
  .hamburger--spin.is-active .hamburger-inner::after {
    bottom: 0;
    -webkit-transform: rotate(-90deg);
            transform: rotate(-90deg);
    -webkit-transition: bottom 0.1s ease-out, -webkit-transform 0.22s 0.12s cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1);
    transition: bottom 0.1s ease-out, -webkit-transform 0.22s 0.12s cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1);
    transition: bottom 0.1s ease-out, transform 0.22s 0.12s cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1);
    transition: bottom 0.1s ease-out, transform 0.22s 0.12s cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1), -webkit-transform 0.22s 0.12s cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1); }

/*!
 * Hamburgers
 * @description Tasty CSS-animated hamburgers
 * @author Jonathan Suh @jonsuh
 * @site https://jonsuh.com/hamburgers
 * @link https://github.com/jonsuh/hamburgers
 */
.hamburger {
  display: inline-block;
  cursor: pointer;
  position: relative;
  -webkit-transition-property: opacity, -webkit-filter;
  transition-property: opacity, -webkit-filter;
  transition-property: opacity, filter;
  transition-property: opacity, filter, -webkit-filter;
  -webkit-transition-duration: 0.15s;
          transition-duration: 0.15s;
  -webkit-transition-timing-function: linear;
          transition-timing-function: linear; }
  .hamburger:hover {
    opacity: 0.7; }
  .hamburger.is-active:hover {
    opacity: 0.7; }
  .hamburger.is-active .hamburger-inner,
  .hamburger.is-active .hamburger-inner::before,
  .hamburger.is-active .hamburger-inner::after {
    background-color: #e7131a; }

.hamburger-box {
  width: 20px;
  height: 15px;
  display: inline-block;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden; }

.hamburger-inner {
  display: block;
  top: 50%;
  margin-top: -0.5px; }
  .hamburger-inner, .hamburger-inner::before, .hamburger-inner::after {
    width: 20px;
    height: 1px;
    background-color: #000;
    border-radius: 4px;
    position: absolute;
    -webkit-transition-property: -webkit-transform;
    transition-property: -webkit-transform;
    transition-property: transform;
    transition-property: transform, -webkit-transform;
    -webkit-transition-duration: 0.15s;
            transition-duration: 0.15s;
    -webkit-transition-timing-function: ease;
            transition-timing-function: ease; }
  .hamburger-inner::before, .hamburger-inner::after {
    content: '';
    display: block; }
  .hamburger-inner::before {
    top: -7px; }
  .hamburger-inner::after {
    bottom: -7px; }

/*
   * Spin
   */
.hamburger--spin .hamburger-inner {
  -webkit-transition-duration: 0.22s;
          transition-duration: 0.22s;
  -webkit-transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.55, 0.055, 0.675, 0.19);
          transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.55, 0.055, 0.675, 0.19); }
  .hamburger--spin .hamburger-inner::before {
    -webkit-transition: top 0.1s 0.25s ease-in, opacity 0.1s ease-in;
    transition: top 0.1s 0.25s ease-in, opacity 0.1s ease-in; }
  .hamburger--spin .hamburger-inner::after {
    -webkit-transition: bottom 0.1s 0.25s ease-in, -webkit-transform 0.22s cubic-bezier(0.55, 0.055, 0.675, 0.19);
    transition: bottom 0.1s 0.25s ease-in, -webkit-transform 0.22s cubic-bezier(0.55, 0.055, 0.675, 0.19);
    transition: bottom 0.1s 0.25s ease-in, transform 0.22s cubic-bezier(0.55, 0.055, 0.675, 0.19);
    transition: bottom 0.1s 0.25s ease-in, transform 0.22s cubic-bezier(0.55, 0.055, 0.675, 0.19), -webkit-transform 0.22s cubic-bezier(0.55, 0.055, 0.675, 0.19); }

.hamburger--spin.is-active .hamburger-inner {
  -webkit-transform: rotate(225deg);
          transform: rotate(225deg);
  -webkit-transition-delay: 0.12s;
          transition-delay: 0.12s;
  -webkit-transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1);
          transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1); }
  .hamburger--spin.is-active .hamburger-inner::before {
    top: 0;
    opacity: 0;
    -webkit-transition: top 0.1s ease-out, opacity 0.1s 0.12s ease-out;
    transition: top 0.1s ease-out, opacity 0.1s 0.12s ease-out; }
  .hamburger--spin.is-active .hamburger-inner::after {
    bottom: 0;
    -webkit-transform: rotate(-90deg);
            transform: rotate(-90deg);
    -webkit-transition: bottom 0.1s ease-out, -webkit-transform 0.22s 0.12s cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1);
    transition: bottom 0.1s ease-out, -webkit-transform 0.22s 0.12s cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1);
    transition: bottom 0.1s ease-out, transform 0.22s 0.12s cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1);
    transition: bottom 0.1s ease-out, transform 0.22s 0.12s cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1), -webkit-transform 0.22s 0.12s cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1); }

/* Gulp b2b must be run in order for changes to this file to be relected in
   breakpoints.json. This task is part of the build and also can be run independently */
.c-search__container {
  -webkit-box-align: center;
      -ms-flex-align: center;
          align-items: center;
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
  position: relative;
  right: 0;
  width: 362px;
  z-index: 999; }

.c-search__container__container {
  display: none;
  opacity: 0;
  overflow: hidden;
  -webkit-transition: width 0.33s;
  transition: width 0.33s;
  width: 0;
  height: 30px;
  z-index: 5000000; }
  @media (min-width: 576px) {
    .c-search__container__container {
      display: none; } }
  @media (min-width: 784px) {
    .c-search__container__container {
      display: block; } }

.c-search__container__container.is-open {
  width: 362px;
  right: 0;
  height: auto;
  opacity: 1; }

.c-search__container__container.is-overflowing {
  overflow: visible; }

.c-search {
  border: 1px solid #c7c7c7;
  border-radius: 2px;
  color: #000;
  font-family: "Graphik", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Segoe UI, Arial, sans-serif;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
  padding: 16px 8px;
  -webkit-transition: opacity 0.33s;
  transition: opacity 0.33s;
  width: 100%;
  letter-spacing: 0.25px; }
  .c-search::-webkit-input-placeholder {
    color: #767676;
    font-weight: 400; }
  .c-search:-ms-input-placeholder {
    color: #767676;
    font-weight: 400; }
  .c-search::-ms-input-placeholder {
    color: #767676;
    font-weight: 400; }
  .c-search::placeholder {
    color: #767676;
    font-weight: 400; }
  @media (min-width: 576px) {
    .c-search {
      background-color: #fff;
      border: 1px solid #c7c7c7;
      color: #000;
      margin-bottom: 24px;
      padding: 16px 8px; } }
  @media (min-width: 784px) {
    .c-search {
      border: none;
      color: #999;
      margin-bottom: 0;
      padding: 8px 8px 8px 32px; } }

.c-search__icon {
  fill: #000;
  height: 16px;
  width: 16px; }

.c-search__open {
  -webkit-box-align: center;
      -ms-flex-align: center;
          align-items: center;
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
  height: auto;
  margin-top: 1px;
  -webkit-transition: margin-left 0.33s;
  transition: margin-left 0.33s;
  z-index: 999; }

.c-search__open .c-search__icon,
.c-search__close .c-search__icon {
  -webkit-transition: fill 0.3s;
  transition: fill 0.3s; }

.c-search__open:active .c-search__icon, .c-search__open:focus .c-search__icon,
.c-search__close:active .c-search__icon,
.c-search__close:focus .c-search__icon {
  fill: #999999; }

.c-search__open:hover .c-search__icon,
.c-search__close:hover .c-search__icon {
  fill: #b3b3b3; }

.c-search__close .c-search__icon {
  margin-left: 8px;
  margin-right: 8px;
  stroke: #fff;
  stroke-width: 1px; }

.c-search__menu.c-menu {
  border-radius: 0;
  -webkit-box-pack: end;
      -ms-flex-pack: end;
          justify-content: flex-end;
  top: 34px;
  width: 100%;
  display: none;
  -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 3px 6px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
          box-shadow: 0px 3px 6px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); }
  .c-search__menu.c-menu::before {
    content: none; }
  .c-search__menu.c-menu .c-menu__section {
    padding: 32px; }

.js-search-container.is-open .c-search__menu.c-menu {
  display: block; }

.c-overlay {
  background-color: #000;
  display: block;
  height: 100%;
  left: 0;
  opacity: 0.35;
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  -webkit-transition: opacity 0.33s;
  transition: opacity 0.33s;
  width: 100%;
  z-index: 100; }

  opacity: 0;
  pointer-events: none; }

  -webkit-box-flex: 1;
      -ms-flex: 1;
          flex: 1; }
  @media (min-width: 576px) {
    .c-search__container--mobile {
      display: block; } }
  @media (min-width: 976px) {
    .c-search__container--mobile {
      display: none; } }

  .is-open .c-search__form {
    display: block; }

  visibility: hidden; }

  border-top-right-radius: 2px;
  border-bottom-right-radius: 2px;
  left: 0;
  width: 32px;
  z-index: 5000000; }

  border-bottom: 1px solid #000;
  margin-bottom: 32px;
  position: relative; }

.c-search--mobile {
  background-color: #f7f7f7;
  border: 0;
  border-radius: 2px;
  color: #000;
  font-family: "Graphik", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Segoe UI, Arial, sans-serif;
  font-size: 16px;
  margin-bottom: 0;
  opacity: 1;
  padding: 16px 24px 32px 32px;
  width: 100%; }
  .c-search--mobile::-webkit-input-placeholder {
    color: #767676; }
  .c-search--mobile:-ms-input-placeholder {
    color: #767676; }
  .c-search--mobile::-ms-input-placeholder {
    color: #767676; }
  .c-search--mobile::placeholder {
    color: #767676; }

.c-footer {
  font-size: 16px;
  font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Segoe UI, Arial, sans-serif;
  background-color: #000;
  color: #fff;
  font-family: "Graphik", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Segoe UI, Arial, sans-serif;
  padding: 0 16px 32px; }
  .no-js .c-footer,
  .fonts-loaded .c-footer {
    font-family: "Graphik", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Segoe UI, Arial, sans-serif; }
  .c-footer.lazyloaded {
    opacity: 1; }
  @media (min-width: 784px) {
    .c-footer {
      font-size: 14px;
      padding: 32px 32px 48px; } }

  margin: 0 auto;
  max-width: 1036px; }

  margin-bottom: 32px; }

      border-bottom: 0; } }

  font-size: 14px;
  -webkit-box-align: center;
      -ms-flex-align: center;
          align-items: center;
  cursor: pointer;
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
  font-weight: 700;
  -webkit-box-pack: justify;
      -ms-flex-pack: justify;
          justify-content: space-between;
  letter-spacing: 0.5px;
  padding: 24px 0;
  text-transform: uppercase; }

    border-color: #fff;
    border-style: solid;
    border-width: 0 0 1px 1px;
    content: '';

    margin-right: 4px;

            transform: rotateX(0) rotateZ(-45deg);

            transform-origin: center center;

              transform: rotateX(180deg) rotateZ(-45deg); }

      padding: 0; } }

    -webkit-transform: rotateX(180deg) rotateZ(-45deg);
            transform: rotateX(180deg) rotateZ(-45deg);

    transition: -webkit-transform 250ms linear;
    transition: transform 250ms linear;
    transition: transform 250ms linear, -webkit-transform 250ms linear; }

  height: auto;
  left: 50%;
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  -webkit-transform: translateX(-50%);
          transform: translateX(-50%);
  width: 210px; }

    .c-menu {
      background-color: #fff; }

        content: '';

        position: absolute; }

        background: #fff;
        border-left: 1px solid #dbdbdb;
        border-top: 1px solid #dbdbdb;

        right: 0;
        top: -10px;
        -webkit-transform: rotate(45deg);
                transform: rotate(45deg);
        width: 18px; }
      .c-menu::after {
        background: transparent;
        top: -18px;
        width: 100%; } }

/* stylelint-disable max-nesting-depth */
/*!
 * Hamburgers
 * @description Tasty CSS-animated hamburgers
 * @author Jonathan Suh @jonsuh
 * @site https://jonsuh.com/hamburgers
 * @link https://github.com/jonsuh/hamburgers
 */
.hamburger {
  display: inline-block;
  cursor: pointer;
  position: relative;
  -webkit-transition-property: opacity, -webkit-filter;
  transition-property: opacity, -webkit-filter;
  transition-property: opacity, filter;
  transition-property: opacity, filter, -webkit-filter;
  -webkit-transition-duration: 0.15s;
          transition-duration: 0.15s;
  -webkit-transition-timing-function: linear;
          transition-timing-function: linear; }
  .hamburger:hover {
    opacity: 0.7; }
  .hamburger.is-active:hover {
    opacity: 0.7; }
  .hamburger.is-active .hamburger-inner,
  .hamburger.is-active .hamburger-inner::before,
  .hamburger.is-active .hamburger-inner::after {
    background-color: #e7131a; }

.hamburger-box {
  width: 20px;
  height: 15px;
  display: inline-block;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden; }

.hamburger-inner {
  display: block;
  top: 50%;
  margin-top: -0.5px; }
  .hamburger-inner, .hamburger-inner::before, .hamburger-inner::after {
    width: 20px;
    height: 1px;
    background-color: #000;
    border-radius: 4px;
    position: absolute;
    -webkit-transition-property: -webkit-transform;
    transition-property: -webkit-transform;
    transition-property: transform;
    transition-property: transform, -webkit-transform;
    -webkit-transition-duration: 0.15s;
            transition-duration: 0.15s;
    -webkit-transition-timing-function: ease;
            transition-timing-function: ease; }
  .hamburger-inner::before, .hamburger-inner::after {
    content: '';
    display: block; }
  .hamburger-inner::before {
    top: -7px; }
  .hamburger-inner::after {
    bottom: -7px; }

/*
   * Spin
   */
.hamburger--spin .hamburger-inner {
  -webkit-transition-duration: 0.22s;
          transition-duration: 0.22s;
  -webkit-transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.55, 0.055, 0.675, 0.19);
          transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.55, 0.055, 0.675, 0.19); }
  .hamburger--spin .hamburger-inner::before {
    -webkit-transition: top 0.1s 0.25s ease-in, opacity 0.1s ease-in;
    transition: top 0.1s 0.25s ease-in, opacity 0.1s ease-in; }
  .hamburger--spin .hamburger-inner::after {
    -webkit-transition: bottom 0.1s 0.25s ease-in, -webkit-transform 0.22s cubic-bezier(0.55, 0.055, 0.675, 0.19);
    transition: bottom 0.1s 0.25s ease-in, -webkit-transform 0.22s cubic-bezier(0.55, 0.055, 0.675, 0.19);
    transition: bottom 0.1s 0.25s ease-in, transform 0.22s cubic-bezier(0.55, 0.055, 0.675, 0.19);
    transition: bottom 0.1s 0.25s ease-in, transform 0.22s cubic-bezier(0.55, 0.055, 0.675, 0.19), -webkit-transform 0.22s cubic-bezier(0.55, 0.055, 0.675, 0.19); }

.hamburger--spin.is-active .hamburger-inner {
  -webkit-transform: rotate(225deg);
          transform: rotate(225deg);
  -webkit-transition-delay: 0.12s;
          transition-delay: 0.12s;
  -webkit-transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1);
          transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1); }
  .hamburger--spin.is-active .hamburger-inner::before {
    top: 0;
    opacity: 0;
    -webkit-transition: top 0.1s ease-out, opacity 0.1s 0.12s ease-out;
    transition: top 0.1s ease-out, opacity 0.1s 0.12s ease-out; }
  .hamburger--spin.is-active .hamburger-inner::after {
    bottom: 0;
    -webkit-transform: rotate(-90deg);
            transform: rotate(-90deg);
    -webkit-transition: bottom 0.1s ease-out, -webkit-transform 0.22s 0.12s cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1);
    transition: bottom 0.1s ease-out, -webkit-transform 0.22s 0.12s cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1);
    transition: bottom 0.1s ease-out, transform 0.22s 0.12s cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1);
    transition: bottom 0.1s ease-out, transform 0.22s 0.12s cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1), -webkit-transform 0.22s 0.12s cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1); }

    opacity: 0;

        flex-shrink: 1; }

   breakpoints.json. This task is part of the build and also can be run independently */
/* Gulp b2b must be run in order for changes to this file to be relected in
   breakpoints.json. This task is part of the build and also can be run independently */
@-webkit-keyframes bounce {
  0%,
  100% {
    -webkit-transform: scale(0);
            transform: scale(0); }
  50% {
    -webkit-transform: scale(1);
            transform: scale(1); } }
@keyframes bounce {
  0%,
  100% {
    -webkit-transform: scale(0);
            transform: scale(0); }
  50% {
    -webkit-transform: scale(1);
            transform: scale(1); } }

.c-btn {
  font-size: 14px;
  font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Segoe UI, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-box-align: center;
      -ms-flex-align: center;
          align-items: center;
  background-color: #000;
  border: 1px solid #000;
  border-radius: 4px;
  color: #fff;
  display: -webkit-inline-box;
  display: -ms-inline-flexbox;
  display: inline-flex;
  font-weight: 400;
  line-height: 1.25;
  padding: 8px 16px 10px;
  text-decoration: none;
  -webkit-transition: all 150ms;
  transition: all 150ms; }
  .no-js .c-btn,
  .fonts-loaded .c-btn {
    font-family: "Graphik", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Segoe UI, Arial, sans-serif; }
  .c-btn:hover {
    background-color: #39434b;
    border-color: #39434b;
    -webkit-transition: all 300ms;
    transition: all 300ms; }

  font-size: 14px;
  letter-spacing: -0.25px;
  padding: 7px 12px; }

  padding: 16px 24px; }

  -webkit-box-pack: center;
      -ms-flex-pack: center;
          justify-content: center;
  width: 100%; }

.c-input {
  font-size: 14px;
  font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Segoe UI, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
          box-sizing: border-box;
  background-clip: padding-box;
  background-color: #fff;
  border: 1px solid #c0ccda;
  border-radius: 4px;
  color: #000;
  display: inline-block;
  line-height: 1.25;
  padding: 8px 16px 10px;
  -webkit-transition: border-color ease-in-out 0.15s, -webkit-box-shadow ease-in-out 0.15s;
  transition: border-color ease-in-out 0.15s, -webkit-box-shadow ease-in-out 0.15s;
  transition: border-color ease-in-out 0.15s, box-shadow ease-in-out 0.15s;
  transition: border-color ease-in-out 0.15s, box-shadow ease-in-out 0.15s, -webkit-box-shadow ease-in-out 0.15s; }
  .no-js .c-input,
  .fonts-loaded .c-input {
    font-family: "Graphik", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Segoe UI, Arial, sans-serif; }
  .c-input::-webkit-input-placeholder {
    color: #5e6a74; }
  .c-input::-moz-placeholder {
    color: #5e6a74; }
  .c-input:-ms-input-placeholder {
    color: #5e6a74; }
  .c-input:focus {
    border-color: #31c6cc;
    -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(49, 198, 204, 0.25);
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(49, 198, 204, 0.25);
    outline: 0; }
  .c-input:disabled, .c-input[readonly] {
    background-color: #e7e7e7;
    cursor: not-allowed; }
  .was-validated .c-input:valid,
  .was-validated .c-input.is-valid, .c-input.is-valid {
    border-color: #038768;
    -webkit-box-shadow: none;
            box-shadow: none; }
    .was-validated .c-input:valid:focus,
    .was-validated .c-input.is-valid:focus, .c-input.is-valid:focus {
      -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(3, 135, 104, 0.25);
              box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(3, 135, 104, 0.25); }
    .was-validated .c-input:valid ~ .c-feedback--valid,
    .was-validated .c-input.is-valid ~ .c-feedback--valid, .c-input.is-valid ~ .c-feedback--valid {
      display: block; }
    .was-validated .c-input:valid ~ .c-helper-text,
    .was-validated .c-input.is-valid ~ .c-helper-text, .c-input.is-valid ~ .c-helper-text {
      display: none; }
  .was-validated .c-input:invalid,
  .was-validated .c-input.is-invalid, .c-input.is-invalid {
    border-color: #e7131a;
    -webkit-box-shadow: none;
            box-shadow: none; }
    .was-validated .c-input:invalid:focus,
    .was-validated .c-input.is-invalid:focus, .c-input.is-invalid:focus {
      -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(231, 19, 26, 0.25);
              box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(231, 19, 26, 0.25); }
    .was-validated .c-input:invalid ~ .c-feedback--invalid,
    .was-validated .c-input.is-invalid ~ .c-feedback--invalid, .c-input.is-invalid ~ .c-feedback--invalid {
      display: block; }
    .was-validated .c-input:invalid ~ .c-helper-text,
    .was-validated .c-input.is-invalid ~ .c-helper-text, .c-input.is-invalid ~ .c-helper-text {
      display: none; }

  display: block;
  width: 100%; }

  font-size: 14px;
  padding: 7px 12px; }

  padding: 16px; }

/* Gulp b2b must be run in order for changes to this file to be relected in
   breakpoints.json. This task is part of the build and also can be run independently */
.c-search__container {
  -webkit-box-align: center;
      -ms-flex-align: center;
          align-items: center;
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
  position: relative;
  right: 0;
  width: 362px;
  z-index: 999; }

.c-search__container__container {
  display: none;
  opacity: 0;
  overflow: hidden;
  -webkit-transition: width 0.33s;
  transition: width 0.33s;
  width: 0;
  height: 30px;
  z-index: 5000000; }
  @media (min-width: 576px) {
    .c-search__container__container {
      display: none; } }
  @media (min-width: 784px) {
    .c-search__container__container {
      display: block; } }

.c-search__container__container.is-open {
  width: 362px;
  right: 0;
  height: auto;
  opacity: 1; }

.c-search__container__container.is-overflowing {
  overflow: visible; }

.c-search {
  border: 1px solid #c7c7c7;
  border-radius: 2px;
  color: #000;
  font-family: "Graphik", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Segoe UI, Arial, sans-serif;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
  padding: 16px 8px;
  -webkit-transition: opacity 0.33s;
  transition: opacity 0.33s;
  width: 100%;
  letter-spacing: 0.25px; }
  .c-search::-webkit-input-placeholder {
    color: #767676;
    font-weight: 400; }
  .c-search:-ms-input-placeholder {
    color: #767676;
    font-weight: 400; }
  .c-search::-ms-input-placeholder {
    color: #767676;
    font-weight: 400; }
  .c-search::placeholder {
    color: #767676;
    font-weight: 400; }
  @media (min-width: 576px) {
    .c-search {
      background-color: #fff;
      border: 1px solid #c7c7c7;
      color: #000;
      margin-bottom: 24px;
      padding: 16px 8px; } }
  @media (min-width: 784px) {
    .c-search {
      border: none;
      color: #999;
      margin-bottom: 0;
      padding: 8px 8px 8px 32px; } }

.c-search__icon {
  fill: #000;
  height: 16px;
  width: 16px; }

.c-search__open {
  -webkit-box-align: center;
      -ms-flex-align: center;
          align-items: center;
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
  height: auto;
  margin-top: 1px;
  -webkit-transition: margin-left 0.33s;
  transition: margin-left 0.33s;
  z-index: 999; }

.c-search__open .c-search__icon,
.c-search__close .c-search__icon {
  -webkit-transition: fill 0.3s;
  transition: fill 0.3s; }

.c-search__open:active .c-search__icon, .c-search__open:focus .c-search__icon,
.c-search__close:active .c-search__icon,
.c-search__close:focus .c-search__icon {
  fill: #999999; }

.c-search__close:hover .c-search__icon {
  fill: #b3b3b3; }

  margin-left: 8px;
  margin-right: 8px;
  stroke: #fff;
  stroke-width: 1px; }

  -webkit-box-pack: end;
      -ms-flex-pack: end;
          justify-content: flex-end;

  width: 100%;

     object-position: top;
  width: 100vw; }

  -webkit-box-align: center;
      -ms-flex-align: center;
          align-items: center;
  background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, from(transparent), to(#000));
  background: linear-gradient(to bottom, transparent, #000);
  bottom: 0%;

  display: -ms-flexbox;

  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;

      -ms-flex-pack: end;

      -webkit-box-pack: start;
          -ms-flex-pack: start;
              justify-content: flex-start; } }

          box-sizing: border-box; }

    -webkit-box-sizing: inherit;
            box-sizing: inherit; }

  border: 0;

  height: 1px;
  margin: -1px;
  overflow: hidden;
  padding: 0;
  position: absolute;
  width: 1px; }

  display: none !important; }

  -webkit-transition: 1s ease;
  transition: 1s ease; }

  opacity: 0;
  -webkit-transition: opacity 500ms;
  transition: opacity 500ms; }

    opacity: 1; }

          filter: blur(4px);
  opacity: 0; }

    -webkit-filter: none;
            filter: none;
    opacity: 1; }

       object-fit: cover; } }

  </style>
  <script nomodule="" src="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/tng/static/frontend/dist/theatlantic/js/polyfill.8a4effa59067.js">
  </script>
  <script>
   document.documentElement.classList.remove('no-js')
  </script>
  <script>
   Promise.all([].map(function (font) {
    if ('fonts' in document) {
      return document.fonts.load('1em ' + font);
    }

    if ('FontFaceObserver' in window) {
      return new FontFaceObserver(font).load();
    }

    return Promise.resolve();
  })).then(function () {
    document.documentElement.classList.add('fonts-loaded');
    performance.mark('atl:critical_fonts_loaded');
  });
  </script>
  <script>
   "fonts"in document&&document.fonts.addEventListener("loadingdone",function n(e){document.fonts.removeEventListener("loadingdone",n),performance.mark("atl:fonts_loaded")});
  </script>

          <li class="c-expanded-nav-sections__item" itemprop="name">
           <a class="c-menu__link" data-name="nav:expanded-Technology" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/technology/" id="main-navigation-sections-menu-0-item-9" itemprop="url">
            Technology
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="c-expanded-nav-sections__item" itemprop="name">
           <a class="c-menu__link" data-name="nav:expanded-Family" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/family/" id="main-navigation-sections-menu-0-item-10" itemprop="url">
            Family
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="c-expanded-nav-sections__item" itemprop="name">
           <a class="c-menu__link" data-name="nav:expanded-Projects" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/projects/" id="main-navigation-sections-menu-0-item-11" itemprop="url">
            Projects
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="c-expanded-nav-sections__item" itemprop="name">
           <a class="c-menu__link" data-name="nav:expanded-Business" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/business/" id="main-navigation-sections-menu-0-item-12" itemprop="url">

           </a>

           <a class="c-menu__link" data-name="nav:expanded-Global" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/international/" id="main-navigation-sections-menu-0-item-13" itemprop="url">

   <section class="l-hp-top">
    <div class="l-hp-top__lede">
     <article class="c-cover-story c-cover-story--" id="hp-lede">
      <div class="c-cover-story__image">
       <figure class="o-media c-cover-story__media">
        <a class="o-media__object" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/science/archive/2021/03/americas-coronavirus-catastrophe-began-with-data/618287/">

          <source media="(min-width: 1200px)" srcset="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/_V1EQ-C4VOmqQ97ME6z6VRPiftE=/640x360/filters:format(png)/media/img/mt/2021/03/Artboard_1/original.png, https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/8rhXEGACld92F3R9gIs2rziwahw=/1280x720/filters:format(png)/media/img/mt/2021/03/Artboard_1/original.png 2x">

            <source media="(min-width: 576px)" srcset="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/8GFBzi3JCc1Ej8wAXTjD5dAAols=/67x0:1751x1125/464x310/filters:format(png)/media/img/mt/2021/03/Artboard_1/original.png, https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/iUpR_4VUZM27Q-8rz9mngozcB6Q=/67x0:1751x1125/928x620/filters:format(png)/media/img/mt/2021/03/Artboard_1/original.png 2x">
             <img alt="A line chart superimposed over a microscopic view of the coronavirus" class="o-media__img" srcset="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/Ux9M-XoDoICsOnuBfyMddWhCeww=/576x324/filters:format(png)/media/img/mt/2021/03/Artboard_1/original.png, https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/gqIJ59Ifooouf1-6wXaQtm894B0=/1152x648/filters:format(png)/media/img/mt/2021/03/Artboard_1/original.png 2x"/>
            </source>
           </source>
          </source>
         </picture>
        </a>
        <figcaption class="o-media__credit">

        </figcaption>
       </figure>
      </div>
      <div class="c-cover-story__content">
       <h1 class="o-hed c-cover-story__hed">
        <a class="c-cover-story__hed-link" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/science/archive/2021/03/americas-coronavirus-catastrophe-began-with-data/618287/">
         Why the Pandemic Experts Failed
        </a>
       </h1>
       <p class="o-dek c-cover-story__dek">
        Were still thinking about pandemic data in the wrong ways.
       </p>
       <div class="o-meta c-cover-story__meta">
        <ul class="o-meta__byline">
         <li class="o-meta__author">
          <a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/author/robinson-meyer/">
           Robinson Meyer
          </a>
         </li>
         <li class="o-meta__author">
          <a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/author/alexis-madrigal/">
           Alexis C. Madrigal
          </a>
         </li>
        </ul>
       </div>
      </div>
     </article>
    </div>
    <div class="l-hp-top__ad l-hp-top__ad--mobile c-ad-container">
     <gpt-ad class="c-ad c-ad--full-width" format="injector" lazy-load="2.5" targeting-pos="mobileboxpremium">
      <gpt-sizeset sizes="mobile-wide" viewport-size="[0, 0]">
      </gpt-sizeset>
      <gpt-sizeset sizes="" viewport-size="[784, 0]">
      </gpt-sizeset>
     </gpt-ad>
    </div>
    <section class="l-hp-top__stack">
     <div class="l-hp-top__stack-stories">
      <article class="c-story-strip c-story-strip--stack" id="hp-topstack-0">
       <div class="c-story-strip__content">
        <h2 class="o-hed c-story-strip__hed">
         <a class="c-story-strip__hed-link" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/culture/archive/2021/03/hbos-q-into-the-storm-is-a-gamified-mess/618342/">
          The New QAnon Docuseries Is a Gamified Mess
         </a>
        </h2>
        <div class="o-meta c-story-strip__meta">
         <ul class="o-meta__byline">
          <li class="o-meta__author">
           <a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/author/sophie-gilbert/">
            Sophie Gilbert
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="c-story-strip__image">
        <figure class="o-media c-story-strip__media">
         <a class="o-media__object" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/culture/archive/2021/03/hbos-q-into-the-storm-is-a-gamified-mess/618342/">
          <picture>
           <img alt="Jim Watkins with his son, Ron Watkins" class="o-media__img u-lazy--img lazyload" data-srcset="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/zK8EoTFaWpjn9Y8HsVkH62PvmlQ=/271x0:1351x1080/86x86/media/img/mt/2021/03/jim_watkins_with_his_son_ron_watkins/original.jpg, https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/EqyBbtSTZzBWNxi3s4JNcAmy1cY=/271x0:1351x1080/172x172/media/img/mt/2021/03/jim_watkins_with_his_son_ron_watkins/original.jpg 2x"/>
          </picture>
         </a>
         <noscript>
          <img alt="Jim Watkins with his son, Ron Watkins" class="o-media__img u-object-cover" src="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/zK8EoTFaWpjn9Y8HsVkH62PvmlQ=/271x0:1351x1080/86x86/media/img/mt/2021/03/jim_watkins_with_his_son_ron_watkins/original.jpg"/>
         </noscript>
        </figure>
       </div>
      </article>
      <article class="c-story-strip c-story-strip--stack" id="hp-topstack-1">
       <div class="c-story-strip__content">
        <h2 class="o-hed c-story-strip__hed">
         <a class="c-story-strip__hed-link" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/ideas/archive/2021/03/how-filibuster-killed-accountability-congress/618346/">
          Why McConnell Gets Away With Filibustering
         </a>
        </h2>
        <div class="o-meta c-story-strip__meta">
         <ul class="o-meta__byline">
          <li class="o-meta__author">
           <a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/author/jacob-s-hacker/">
            Jacob S. Hacker
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="o-meta__author">
           <a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/author/paul-pierson/">
            Paul Pierson
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="c-story-strip__image">
        <figure class="o-media c-story-strip__media">
         <a class="o-media__object" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/ideas/archive/2021/03/how-filibuster-killed-accountability-congress/618346/">

           <img alt="Mitch McConnell" class="o-media__img u-lazy--img lazyload" data-srcset="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/QyykH7H3Oon1tjMW7Cu9SGAiVZQ=/788x0:3690x2902/86x86/media/img/mt/2021/03/GettyImages_1307450916/original.jpg, https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/RqKvWy3ttQYUgnfqBy_c8ruN3EQ=/788x0:3690x2902/172x172/media/img/mt/2021/03/GettyImages_1307450916/original.jpg 2x"/>
          </picture>
         </a>
         <noscript>
          <img alt="Mitch McConnell" class="o-media__img u-object-cover" src="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/QyykH7H3Oon1tjMW7Cu9SGAiVZQ=/788x0:3690x2902/86x86/media/img/mt/2021/03/GettyImages_1307450916/original.jpg"/>
         </noscript>
        </figure>
       </div>
      </article>
      <article class="c-story-strip c-story-strip--stack" id="hp-topstack-2">
       <div class="c-story-strip__content">
        <h2 class="o-hed c-story-strip__hed">
         <a class="c-story-strip__hed-link" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/science/archive/2021/03/chick-culling-cruel-wasteful-and-tough-stop/618348/">
          Billions of Day-Old Chicks Are Shredded, Gassed, and Suffocated
         </a>
        </h2>
        <div class="o-meta c-story-strip__meta">
         <ul class="o-meta__byline">
          <li class="o-meta__author">
           <a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/author/jonathan-moens/">
            Jonathan Moens
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="o-meta__author">
           <a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/author/undark/">
            Undark
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="c-story-strip__image">
        <figure class="o-media c-story-strip__media">
         <a class="o-media__object" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/science/archive/2021/03/chick-culling-cruel-wasteful-and-tough-stop/618348/">

           <img alt="A chick on a conveyor belt" class="o-media__img u-lazy--img lazyload" data-srcset="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/ypNNcxP49VZljG7Wky8BVR0Hbws=/616x0:1821x1205/86x86/media/img/mt/2021/03/AP411647572944/original.jpg, https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/-n2UwU8Tn72-ZjUo3JFkUUsGutk=/616x0:1821x1205/172x172/media/img/mt/2021/03/AP411647572944/original.jpg 2x"/>
          </picture>
         </a>
         <noscript>
          <img alt="A chick on a conveyor belt" class="o-media__img u-object-cover" src="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/ypNNcxP49VZljG7Wky8BVR0Hbws=/616x0:1821x1205/86x86/media/img/mt/2021/03/AP411647572944/original.jpg"/>
         </noscript>
        </figure>
       </div>
      </article>
      <article class="c-story-strip c-story-strip--stack" id="hp-topstack-3">
       <div class="c-story-strip__content">
        <h2 class="o-hed c-story-strip__hed">
         <a class="c-story-strip__hed-link" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/ideas/archive/2021/03/how-trump-brokeand-then-saved-impeachment/618340/">
          How Trump BrokeAnd Then SavedImpeachment
         </a>
        </h2>
        <div class="o-meta c-story-strip__meta">
         <ul class="o-meta__byline">
          <li class="o-meta__author">
           <a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/author/tim-naftali/">
            Tim Naftali
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="c-story-strip__image">
        <figure class="o-media c-story-strip__media">
         <a class="o-media__object" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/ideas/archive/2021/03/how-trump-brokeand-then-saved-impeachment/618340/">
          <picture>
           <img alt="An illustration of a broken gavel." class="o-media__img u-lazy--img lazyload" data-srcset="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/A3qCiEyQEO1x-2Z6M7DZ-hgxaAY=/420x0:1670x1250/86x86/media/img/mt/2021/03/kill_impeachment2/original.jpg, https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/lS265cNCslF-Bo7l545XDpAObUc=/420x0:1670x1250/172x172/media/img/mt/2021/03/kill_impeachment2/original.jpg 2x"/>
          </picture>
         </a>
         <noscript>
          <img alt="An illustration of a broken gavel." class="o-media__img u-object-cover" src="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/A3qCiEyQEO1x-2Z6M7DZ-hgxaAY=/420x0:1670x1250/86x86/media/img/mt/2021/03/kill_impeachment2/original.jpg"/>
         </noscript>
        </figure>
       </div>

    <div class="l-hp-top__off-lede">
     <div class="l-hp-top__off-lede-stories">
      <article class="c-offlede c-offlede--" id="hp-offlede-0">
       <div class="c-offlede__image">
        <figure class="o-media c-offlede__media">
         <a class="o-media__object" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/ideas/archive/2021/03/the-asian-spring/618338/">
          <picture>
           <source media="(min-width: 784px)" srcset="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/KNCWJx1FUveCjIDpTo1sbGeyzyU=/1x179:962x720/288x162/media/img/mt/2021/03/01/original.jpg, https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/InMxchRHBSnvJmipJNj4Mkh8l9c=/1x179:962x720/576x324/media/img/mt/2021/03/01/original.jpg 2x">
            <img alt="Tin Swe Thant" class="o-media__img u-lazy--img lazyload" data-srcset="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/InMxchRHBSnvJmipJNj4Mkh8l9c=/1x179:962x720/576x324/media/img/mt/2021/03/01/original.jpg"/>
           </source>
          </picture>
         </a>
         <noscript>
          <img alt="Tin Swe Thant" class="o-media__img u-object-cover" src="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/InMxchRHBSnvJmipJNj4Mkh8l9c=/1x179:962x720/576x324/media/img/mt/2021/03/01/original.jpg"/>
         </noscript>
         <figcaption class="o-media__credit">
          Courtesy of Alex Wagner
         </figcaption>
        </figure>
       </div>
       <div class="c-offlede__content">
        <h2 class="o-hed c-offlede__hed">
         <a class="c-offlede__hed-link" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/ideas/archive/2021/03/the-asian-spring/618338/">
          Our Asian Spring
         </a>
        </h2>
        <div class="o-meta c-offlede__meta">
         <ul class="o-meta__byline">
          <li class="o-meta__author">
           <a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/author/alex-wagner/">
            Alex Wagner
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </div>
       </div>
      </article>
      <article class="c-offlede c-offlede--" id="hp-offlede-1">
       <div class="c-offlede__image">
        <figure class="o-media c-offlede__media">
         <a class="o-media__object" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/family/archive/2021/03/having-dual-career-can-make-you-happier/618311/">
          <picture>
           <source media="(min-width: 784px)" srcset="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/ndAs66lqcmUVn6ie_S9USkN2NhU=/288x162/media/img/mt/2021/03/unnamed-2/original.jpg, https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/L5-LigBisRYxUpwR3fcy9xyS0JA=/576x324/media/img/mt/2021/03/unnamed-2/original.jpg 2x">
            <img alt="illustrated man reading and spinning ball while surfing" class="o-media__img u-lazy--img lazyload" data-srcset="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/L5-LigBisRYxUpwR3fcy9xyS0JA=/576x324/media/img/mt/2021/03/unnamed-2/original.jpg, https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/LeHy6iB_HRFptUNCrlLhCfy2bL8=/1152x648/media/img/mt/2021/03/unnamed-2/original.jpg 2x"/>
           </source>
          </picture>
         </a>
         <noscript>
          <img alt="illustrated man reading and spinning ball while surfing" class="o-media__img u-object-cover" src="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/L5-LigBisRYxUpwR3fcy9xyS0JA=/576x324/media/img/mt/2021/03/unnamed-2/original.jpg"/>
         </noscript>
         <figcaption class="o-media__credit">
          Jan Buchczik
         </figcaption>
        </figure>
       </div>
       <div class="c-offlede__content">
        <h2 class="o-hed c-offlede__hed">
         <a class="c-offlede__hed-link" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/family/archive/2021/03/having-dual-career-can-make-you-happier/618311/">
          Heres 10,000 Hours. Dont Spend It All in One Place.
         </a>
        </h2>
        <div class="o-meta c-offlede__meta">
         <ul class="o-meta__byline">
          <li class="o-meta__author">
           <a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/author/arthur-c-brooks/">
            Arthur C. Brooks
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </div>
       </div>
      </article>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="l-hp-top__ad l-hp-top__ad--full c-ad-container">
     <gpt-ad class="c-ad c-ad--full-width" format="injector" lazy-load="1" sizes-at-0="mobile-wide" sizes-at-976="desktop-wide" targeting-pos="hpboxpremium1">
     </gpt-ad>
    </div>
    <section class="l-hp-top__belt">
     <div class="l-hp-top__belt-stories">
      <article class="c-card c-card--" id="hp-belt-0">
       <div class="c-card__content">
        <h2 class="o-hed c-card__hed">
         <a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/science/archive/2021/03/vaccine-breakthrough-cases/618330/">
          Dont Be Surprised When Vaccinated People Get Infected
         </a>
        </h2>
        <p class="o-dek c-card__dek">
         Post-immunization cases, sometimes called breakthroughs, are very rare and very expected.
        </p>
        <div class="o-meta c-card__meta">
         <ul class="o-meta__byline">
          <li class="o-meta__author">
           <a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/author/katherine-j-wu/">
            Katherine J. Wu
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="c-card__image">
        <figure class="o-media c-card__media">
         <a class="o-media__object" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/science/archive/2021/03/vaccine-breakthrough-cases/618330/">
          <picture>
           <source media="(min-width: 576px)" srcset="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/zVpltfTeBwsjgxA_d7veepDA1vc=/320x180/media/img/mt/2021/03/GettyImages_1231539203/original.jpg, https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/PSx1TCj55SndDkkPbMvGsTiivq0=/640x360/media/img/mt/2021/03/GettyImages_1231539203/original.jpg 2x">
            <img alt="healthcare workers prepare doses of a COVID-19 vaccine" class="o-media__img u-lazy--img lazyload" data-srcset="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/YFpUhIpTAevYnKrqMYdYZ4T44V8=/981x0:2387x1406/86x86/media/img/mt/2021/03/GettyImages_1231539203/original.jpg, https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/pkVC2BtGHYGsZc_EdmWwec1erTQ=/981x0:2387x1406/172x172/media/img/mt/2021/03/GettyImages_1231539203/original.jpg 2x"/>
           </source>
          </picture>
         </a>
         <noscript>
          <img alt="healthcare workers prepare doses of a COVID-19 vaccine" class="o-media__object u-object-cover" src="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/YFpUhIpTAevYnKrqMYdYZ4T44V8=/981x0:2387x1406/86x86/media/img/mt/2021/03/GettyImages_1231539203/original.jpg"/>
         </noscript>
         <figcaption class="o-media__credit c-card__media-credit">
          Micah Green / Bloomberg / Getty
         </figcaption>
        </figure>
       </div>
      </article>
      <article class="c-card c-card--" id="hp-belt-1">
       <div class="c-card__content">
        <h2 class="o-hed c-card__hed">
         <a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/science/archive/2018/10/meet-endoterrestrials/571939/">
          Meet the Endoterrestrials
         </a>
        </h2>
        <p class="o-dek c-card__dek">
         They live thousands of feet below the Earths surface. They eat hydrogen and exhale methane. And they may shape our world more profoundly than we can imagine.
        </p>
        <div class="o-meta c-card__meta">
         <ul class="o-meta__byline">
          <li class="o-meta__author">
           <a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/author/douglas-fox/">
            Douglas Fox
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="c-card__image">
        <figure class="o-media c-card__media">
         <a class="o-media__object" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/science/archive/2018/10/meet-endoterrestrials/571939/">
          <picture>
           <source media="(min-width: 576px)" srcset="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/-8qAoaB0VxQqODiXO1o91e3Qc0c=/320x180/media/img/mt/2018/10/v1_72dpi/original.jpg, https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/iMPR7y5LPFRrEneaHc_QO5DtoR0=/640x360/media/img/mt/2018/10/v1_72dpi/original.jpg 2x">
            <img alt="Researchers bore deep into the rocks of the Earth." class="o-media__img u-lazy--img lazyload" data-srcset="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/vYw-oUb1kow2jAdwmCpXA1zgJoE=/438x0:1563x1125/86x86/media/img/mt/2018/10/v1_72dpi/original.jpg, https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/tntkb_PuZwcWsI_NcnJQ1aNAxcI=/438x0:1563x1125/172x172/media/img/mt/2018/10/v1_72dpi/original.jpg 2x"/>
           </source>
          </picture>
         </a>
         <noscript>
          <img alt="Researchers bore deep into the rocks of the Earth." class="o-media__object u-object-cover" src="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/vYw-oUb1kow2jAdwmCpXA1zgJoE=/438x0:1563x1125/86x86/media/img/mt/2018/10/v1_72dpi/original.jpg"/>
         </noscript>
         <figcaption class="o-media__credit c-card__media-credit">
          Zo van Dijk
         </figcaption>
        </figure>
       </div>
      </article>
      <article class="c-card c-card--" id="hp-belt-2">
       <div class="c-card__content">
        <h2 class="o-hed c-card__hed">
         <a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/ideas/archive/2021/03/the-us-and-china-finally-get-real-with-each-other/618345/">
          The U.S. and China Finally Get Real With Each Other
         </a>
        </h2>
        <p class="o-dek c-card__dek">
         The exchange in Alaska may have seemed like a debacle, but it was actually a necessary step to a more stable relationship between the two countries.
        </p>
        <div class="o-meta c-card__meta">
         <ul class="o-meta__byline">
          <li class="o-meta__author">
           <a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/author/thomas-wright/">
            Thomas Wright
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="c-card__image">
        <figure class="o-media c-card__media">
         <a class="o-media__object" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/ideas/archive/2021/03/the-us-and-china-finally-get-real-with-each-other/618345/">
          <picture>
           <source media="(min-width: 576px)" srcset="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/XKClz7payG63IX_VwXHY2P27kEk=/0x10:2000x1135/320x180/media/img/mt/2021/03/US_vs_China/original.jpg, https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/b6zoywmfc2-OQR5w_tA5dxkBzH4=/0x10:2000x1135/640x360/media/img/mt/2021/03/US_vs_China/original.jpg 2x">
            <img alt="An illustration of an eagle and a panda." class="o-media__img u-lazy--img lazyload" data-srcset="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/rQ_3VFbVgp5Nw9sMOu8Z_xHVz5E=/375x0:1625x1250/86x86/media/img/mt/2021/03/US_vs_China/original.jpg, https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/beSMVSRBCpIpDrlacAUFp_l6UQM=/375x0:1625x1250/172x172/media/img/mt/2021/03/US_vs_China/original.jpg 2x"/>
           </source>
          </picture>
         </a>
         <noscript>
          <img alt="An illustration of an eagle and a panda." class="o-media__object u-object-cover" src="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/rQ_3VFbVgp5Nw9sMOu8Z_xHVz5E=/375x0:1625x1250/86x86/media/img/mt/2021/03/US_vs_China/original.jpg"/>
         </noscript>
         <figcaption class="o-media__credit c-card__media-credit">
          Getty / Adam Maida / The Atlantic
         </figcaption>
        </figure>
       </div>
      </article>
      <article class="c-card c-card--" id="hp-belt-3">
       <div class="c-card__content">
        <h2 class="o-hed c-card__hed">
         <a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/ideas/archive/2021/03/meghan-and-diana-could-have-saved-royal-family/618318/">
          Meghan Markle Didnt Do the Work
         </a>
        </h2>
        <p class="o-dek c-card__dek">
         Part of Meghans problem was her navet about the workings of the Royal Family, which she had assumed would be similar to the workings of celebrity culture.
        </p>
        <div class="o-meta c-card__meta">
         <ul class="o-meta__byline">
          <li class="o-meta__author">
           <a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/author/caitlin-flanagan/">
            Caitlin Flanagan
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="c-card__image">
        <figure class="o-media c-card__media">
         <a class="o-media__object" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/ideas/archive/2021/03/meghan-and-diana-could-have-saved-royal-family/618318/">
          <picture>
           <source media="(min-width: 576px)" srcset="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/RQ2MgjJHbl58XfBVuk13gSh7lmE=/320x180/media/img/mt/2021/03/GettyImages_1007231222/original.jpg, https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/1gow2kcN1acH7-idRas6H28N2Bs=/640x360/media/img/mt/2021/03/GettyImages_1007231222/original.jpg 2x">
            <img alt="Prince Charles, the Prince of Wales; Camilla, the Duchess of Cornwall; Prince Andrew, the Duke of York; Queen Elizabeth ll; Meghan, the Duchess of Sussex; Prince Harry, the Duke of Sussex; Prince William, the Duke of Cambridge; and Catherine, the Duchess of Cambridge, stand on the balcony of Buckingham Palace." class="o-media__img u-lazy--img lazyload" data-srcset="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/kq7eajw-lf0R-9TmwqnZO8DdLcw=/797x0:2125x1328/86x86/media/img/mt/2021/03/GettyImages_1007231222/original.jpg, https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/JwI-2MIAdL7cwJbwV09XgtRdb30=/797x0:2125x1328/172x172/media/img/mt/2021/03/GettyImages_1007231222/original.jpg 2x"/>
           </source>
          </picture>
         </a>
         <noscript>
          <img alt="Prince Charles, the Prince of Wales; Camilla, the Duchess of Cornwall; Prince Andrew, the Duke of York; Queen Elizabeth ll; Meghan, the Duchess of Sussex; Prince Harry, the Duke of Sussex; Prince William, the Duke of Cambridge; and Catherine, the Duchess of Cambridge, stand on the balcony of Buckingham Palace." class="o-media__object u-object-cover" src="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/kq7eajw-lf0R-9TmwqnZO8DdLcw=/797x0:2125x1328/86x86/media/img/mt/2021/03/GettyImages_1007231222/original.jpg"/>
         </noscript>
         <figcaption class="o-media__credit c-card__media-credit">
          Anwar Hussein / WireImage / Getty
         </figcaption>
        </figure>
       </div>
      </article>

    </section>

           <source media="(min-width: 576px)" srcset="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/b-4Fxdk1up7YmYIkOuknZJH1yN8=/516x0:5366x3240/464x310/media/img/mt/2021/03/led18_19_RMC_motherbook_sRGB/original.jpg, https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/CiYwuKVU4JHeRxbhGtHn2RYlMYc=/516x0:5366x3240/928x620/media/img/mt/2021/03/led18_19_RMC_motherbook_sRGB/original.jpg 2x">
            <img alt="A baby's eye caught in the sunlight in mothers arms" class="o-media__img u-lazy--img lazyload" data-srcset="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/ZCscbRtg9UDGZpmIWbjBuiP-Wl4=/576x324/media/img/mt/2021/03/led18_19_RMC_motherbook_sRGB/original.jpg, https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/AwPnMYVs8j1Qj6iYEXFVgloE-e8=/1152x648/media/img/mt/2021/03/led18_19_RMC_motherbook_sRGB/original.jpg 2x"/>
           </source>
          </picture>
         </a>
         <noscript>
          <img alt="A baby's eye caught in the sunlight in mothers arms" class="o-media__img u-object-cover" src="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/ZCscbRtg9UDGZpmIWbjBuiP-Wl4=/576x324/media/img/mt/2021/03/led18_19_RMC_motherbook_sRGB/original.jpg"/>
         </noscript>
         <figcaption class="o-media__credit">
          Rose Marie Cromwell
         </figcaption>
        </figure>

       <div class="c-feature__content">
        <h2 class="o-hed c-feature__hed">
         <a class="c-feature__hed-link" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/culture/archive/2021/03/isolation-becoming-new-parent-during-pandemic/618244/">
          Becoming a Parent During the Pandemic Was the Hardest Thing Ive Ever Done
         </a>
        </h2>
        <p class="o-dek c-feature__dek">
         This completely different person Ive become since I gave birth is someone virtually no one knows.
        </p>
        <div class="o-meta c-feature__meta">
         <ul class="o-meta__byline">
          <li class="o-meta__author">
           <a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/author/sophie-gilbert/">
            Sophie Gilbert
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </div>
       </div>
      </article>

           The Prophecies of Q
          </a>
         </h2>
         <div class="o-meta c-story-strip__meta">
          <ul class="o-meta__byline">
           <li class="o-meta__author">
            <a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/author/adrienne-lafrance/">
             Adrienne LaFrance
            </a>
           </li>
          </ul>

          </a>

       <article class="c-story-strip c-story-strip--off-off-lede-stack" id="hp-lowerbelt-2">
        <div class="c-story-strip__content">
         <h2 class="o-hed c-story-strip__hed">
          <a class="c-story-strip__hed-link" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/ideas/archive/2021/03/the-system-held/618343/">
           The System Held
          </a>
         </h2>
         <div class="o-meta c-story-strip__meta">
          <ul class="o-meta__byline">
           <li class="o-meta__author">
            <a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/author/yascha-mounk/">
             Yascha Mounk
            </a>
           </li>
          </ul>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="c-story-strip__image">
         <figure class="o-media c-story-strip__media">
          <a class="o-media__object" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/ideas/archive/2021/03/the-system-held/618343/">
           <picture>
            <img alt="A U.S. Treasury check" class="o-media__img u-lazy--img lazyload" data-srcset="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/Juua_NM2cjHtiZWF2PUXyws9wjw=/217x0:2928x2711/86x86/media/img/mt/2021/03/GettyImages_1221870055/original.jpg, https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/sTWpwAaIFFDxlDERsDi9E5GdhCY=/217x0:2928x2711/172x172/media/img/mt/2021/03/GettyImages_1221870055/original.jpg 2x"/>
           </picture>
          </a>
          <noscript>
           <img alt="A U.S. Treasury check" class="o-media__img u-object-cover" src="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/Juua_NM2cjHtiZWF2PUXyws9wjw=/217x0:2928x2711/86x86/media/img/mt/2021/03/GettyImages_1221870055/original.jpg"/>

      <div class="l-hp-top__bottom-stack">
       <article class="c-story-strip c-story-strip--bottom-stack" id="hp-bottomstack">
        <div class="c-story-strip__content">
         <h2 class="o-hed c-story-strip__hed">
          <a class="c-story-strip__hed-link" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/books/archive/2021/03/poem-jose-olivarez-ode-tortillas/618341/">
           Ode to Tortillas
          </a>
         </h2>
         <div class="o-meta c-story-strip__meta">
          <ul class="o-meta__byline">
           <li class="o-meta__author">
            <a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/author/jose-olivarez/">
             Jos Olivarez
            </a>
           </li>
          </ul>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="c-story-strip__image">
         <figure class="o-media c-story-strip__media">
          <a class="o-media__object" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/books/archive/2021/03/poem-jose-olivarez-ode-tortillas/618341/">
           <picture>
            <img alt="A woman lit by a ray of light against a black background lays out tortillas she's cut from dough" class="o-media__img u-lazy--img lazyload" data-srcset="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/UkA4lrYaoohUpUugcFjyeZMclqE=/487x0:1428x941/86x86/media/img/mt/2021/03/tortilla_03/original.jpg, https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/QsSz8zcxFODcvjiADAX9M_OPnIg=/487x0:1428x941/172x172/media/img/mt/2021/03/tortilla_03/original.jpg 2x"/>
           </picture>
          </a>
          <noscript>
           <img alt="A woman lit by a ray of light against a black background lays out tortillas she's cut from dough" class="o-media__img u-object-cover" src="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/UkA4lrYaoohUpUugcFjyeZMclqE=/487x0:1428x941/86x86/media/img/mt/2021/03/tortilla_03/original.jpg"/>
          </noscript>
         </figure>
        </div>
       </article>
       <gpt-ad class="s-native s-native s-native--hp-lede s-native--bottom-stack s-native--short-title" format="native" lazy-load="1" sizes-at-0="native" targeting-native="standard,gift" targeting-pos="native-belt-hp">
        <gpt-sizeset sizes="native" viewport-size="[0, 0]">
        </gpt-sizeset>
       </gpt-ad>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </section>
   <section class="c-hp c-hp--mid">

       <article class="c-tease c-tease--article c-tease--" id="hp-latest-8">

         </figure>
        </div>
        <div class="c-tease__content">
         <h3 class="o-hed c-tease__hed">
          <a class="c-tease__link" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/culture/archive/2021/03/our-year-on-zoom-a-photo-essay/618306/">
           End Meeting for All
          </a>
         </h3>
         <div class="o-meta c-tease__meta">
          <ul class="o-meta__byline">
           <li class="o-meta__author">
            <a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/author/james-parker/">
             James Parker
            </a>
           </li>
          </ul>
          <time class="o-meta__date">
           March 19, 2021
          </time>
         </div>
        </div>
       </article>
      </li>
      <li class="o-river__item o-river__item--tight">
       <article class="c-tease c-tease--article c-tease--" id="hp-latest-17">

         <figure class="o-media c-tease__media">

          <li class="o-meta__author">

            Caitlin Flanagan
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </div>
       </li>
       <li class="c-popular__collection" id="hp-popular-7">
        <a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/health/archive/2021/03/three-ways-pandemic-has-bettered-world/618320/">
         <img alt="Letters in a genetic sequence" class="c-popular__image lazyload" data-srcset="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/Fai8VhodZ_oLuZH5HCutRjBPa0k=/139x0:2865x1688/210x130/media/img/mt/2021/03/COVID_Sequence_02/original.jpg, https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/JY0dlWQo0kzvcHoWzNGNINAkc4U=/139x0:2865x1688/420x260/media/img/mt/2021/03/COVID_Sequence_02/original.jpg 2x"/>
         <noscript>
          <img alt="Letters in a genetic sequence" class="c-popular__image u-object-cover" src="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/Fai8VhodZ_oLuZH5HCutRjBPa0k=/139x0:2865x1688/210x130/media/img/mt/2021/03/COVID_Sequence_02/original.jpg"/>
         </noscript>
        </a>
        <a class="c-popular__link c-popular__link--article" data-river-popular="8" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/health/archive/2021/03/three-ways-pandemic-has-bettered-world/618320/">
         3 Ways the Pandemic Has Made the World Better
        </a>
        <div class="o-meta">
         <ul class="o-meta__byline">
          <li class="o-meta__author">
           <a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/author/zeynep-tufekci/">
            Zeynep Tufekci
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </div>
       </li>
       <li class="c-popular__collection" id="hp-popular-8">
        <a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/health/archive/2021/02/second-vaccine-side-effects/617892/">
         <img alt="a hand holding a syringe" class="c-popular__image lazyload" data-srcset="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/xNE_8Wuom5etpt20udWh46BWhP4=/140x0:2893x1704/210x130/filters:format(png)/media/img/mt/2021/02/Screen_Shot_2021_02_01_at_2.00.32_PM/original.png, https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/L9T3gztIhrKiBe-5mVVGK1WraYo=/140x0:2893x1704/420x260/filters:format(png)/media/img/mt/2021/02/Screen_Shot_2021_02_01_at_2.00.32_PM/original.png 2x"/>

         </noscript>
        </a>
        <a class="c-popular__link c-popular__link--article" data-river-popular="9" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/health/archive/2021/02/second-vaccine-side-effects/617892/">

       <li class="c-popular__collection" id="hp-popular-9">

          <img alt="Korean-Americans in 1992 after the Rodney King riots; An anti-Asian violence rally in Los Angeles in 2021." class="c-popular__image u-object-cover" src="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/ecdz9P6awBsQeCpvkenAcK1ZKuY=/139x0:2865x1688/210x130/media/img/mt/2021/03/AA_Protest_DIP_01/original.jpg"/>

        </a>

     </div>

       <h2 class="o-section-heading">
        <a class="o-section-heading__link" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/free-daily-crossword-puzzle/" id="hp-crossword-title">
         The Atlantic Crossword
        </a>
       </h2>
      </div>
      <div class="c-popular__content">
       <div class="c-popular__text">
        Play the crossword that gets more challenging every weekday.
       </div>
       <figure>
        <picture class="c-popular__img">

          <img alt="The Atlantic Crosswod Promo" src="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/tng/static/theatlantic/img/homepage/crossword_promo.7ca11b824eaa.png"/>

        </picture>
       </figure>

         <div class="c-writers__container--content">
