            Katherine J. Wu
           </a>
          </strong>
          <a class="c-writers__link c-writers__link--article" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/science/archive/2021/03/vaccine-breakthrough-cases/618330/">
           Dont Be Surprised When Vaccinated People Get Infected
          </a>
         </div>
        </li>
        <li class="c-writers__item" id="hp-writersmodule-10">
         <img alt="" class="c-writers__headshot lazyload" data-srcset="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/9fJ1dwbczCAp47OuwfAs4egwrMA=/0x0:1985x1982/144x144/media/None/Okladka_headshot/original.jpg, https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/eE8Fy_RyeSEJ2g31v-NMpX7KaIc=/0x0:1985x1982/288x288/media/None/Okladka_headshot/original.jpg 2x"/>
         <noscript>
          <img alt="" class="c-writers__headshot u-object-cover" src="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/9fJ1dwbczCAp47OuwfAs4egwrMA=/0x0:1985x1982/144x144/media/None/Okladka_headshot/original.jpg"/>
         </noscript>
         <div class="c-writers__container--content">
          <strong>
           <a class="c-writers__link c-writers__link--author" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/author/anne-applebaum/">
            Anne Applebaum
           </a>
          </strong>
          <a class="c-writers__link c-writers__link--article" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/ideas/archive/2021/03/russia-studied-how-get-americans-make-mistakes/618328/">
           The Science of Making Americans Hurt Their Own Country
          </a>
         </div>
        </li>
        <li class="c-writers__item" id="hp-writersmodule-11">
         <img alt="" class="c-writers__headshot lazyload" data-srcset="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/PxKpaPTvw6Gvx1sGv12fXDeIi-0=/144x144/media/None/AMT400/original.jpg, https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/IWuuXkJc4V1FktP5WQ4BH8fWXKo=/288x288/media/None/AMT400/original.jpg 2x"/>
         <noscript>
          <img alt="" class="c-writers__headshot u-object-cover" src="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/PxKpaPTvw6Gvx1sGv12fXDeIi-0=/144x144/media/None/AMT400/original.jpg"/>
         </noscript>
         <div class="c-writers__container--content">
          <strong>
           <a class="c-writers__link c-writers__link--author" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/author/alan-taylor/">
            Alan Taylor
           </a>
          </strong>
          <a class="c-writers__link c-writers__link--article" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/photo/2021/03/photos-week-sandy-mask-silver-man-siberian-mandalorian/618329/">
           Photos of the Week: Sandy Mask, Silver Man, Siberian Mandalorian
          </a>
         </div>
        </li>
       </ul>
      </div>
     </div>

            Episode 107

   function handleSystemLoad() {
  performance.mark('atl:systemjs_loaded');
  function hasOwnProp(o, k) {
    return Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(o, k);
  }

  function entries(o, cb) {
    for (var k in o) { if (hasOwnProp(o, k)) cb(k, o[k]); }
  }

"bf193afe43ba", "article-header": "eda2a4f69813", "dek": "4cb6492a6962", "letters-cta": "062c6702596e", "hero": "a88a631693a1", "most-popular": "f9f1105f141f", "icon": "7de19a51815e", "navigation": "9b6067507dea", "newsletter": "599299310ed3", "recirc-item": "fe5ca436c4f0", "foundation-line": "8ac370b657ac", "lead-embed": "f6268964937c", "dateline": "28fbf04d7fc0", "social-links": "948812328306", "gate": "a836dfba8d2d", "nav-menu-list": "32faab0370a3", "ad": "024245f5440d", "sentinel": "4b31a1465902", "accounts-modal": "438e2d9728f5", "button": "de85cab764a8", "story": "33368261be81", "recirc-content": "7cb94b5a34dc", "share-social": "422eaab3d67e", "editors-choice": "8d4be1494071", "nav-mobile-search": "2a2ef69fe9b3", "newsletters-header": "8fa0b327ad56", "non-metered-nudge": "7a0a0e098270", "_preview": "ac78b067a767", "tease-article": "61e2334760fa", "editors-note": "e535cefd0ce7", "review": "8172b8265d82", "expanded-nav": "21d27f5662e6", "pagination": "2b134bd89a78", "newsletter-list": "948751ec3e71", "expanded-nav-mobile-header": "831b83b35bcb", "expanded-nav-mobile-search": "690c6a37303f", "trump50-hp": "75163a903d41", "related-video": "e8bf3aa71c6c", "picture": "bf6f61a29ec5", "byline": "c4a2e7652ccb", "breaking-news": "23702219ea88", "lead-image": "d10ba239935a", "nudge-expanded": "346397cd8a2d",   var systemjsMap = {};

  entries(staticHashMap, function(dir, files) {
    entries(files, function(basename, hash) {
      var path = 'dist/theatlantic/' + dir + '/' + basename;
      systemjsMap[path + '.js'] = path + '.' + hash + '.js';
    });
  });

  SystemJS.config({
    baseURL: 'https://cdn.theatlantic.com/tng/static/frontend/',
    map: systemjsMap
  });

  this.define = SystemJS.amdDefine;

  SystemJS.set('pageInfo', SystemJS.newModule(window.Atlantic.page_info));

  SystemJS.set('accountsConfig', SystemJS.newModule({
    url: 'https://accounts.theatlantic.com'
  }))

  SystemJS.set('adsConfig', SystemJS.newModule({"globals": {"title": "the-atlantic", "template_raw": "hippo/pages/homepage.html"}, "zone": "/4624/theatlantic.web/homepage/homepage", "adtest_domain": "dctestsite", "lazy_load": 1.5, "prebid": "https://www.theatlantic.com/packages/adsjs/prebid.js", "outofpage": true, "ix": true, "amazon": "3239", "gdpr": false, "datePublished": null, "patchEventHandlers": true, "perfUrl": "https://data-cdn.theatlantic.com/perf.gif"}));
  SystemJS.set('vendorConfig', SystemJS.newModule({gtm: 'GTM-56LJR35'}));

  var hippo = document.createElement('script');
  hippo.async = true;
  hippo.setAttribute('src', 'https://cdn.theatlantic.com/tng/static/frontend/dist/theatlantic/js/hippo.2c04b523633b.js');
  hippo.onload = function handleHippoLoad () {
    performance.mark('atl:hippo_loaded');
    SystemJS.import('theatlantic').then(function () {
      performance.mark('atl:main_loaded');

      Promise.all(
        ["theatlantic/js/components/navigation", "theatlantic/js/homepage"].map(function (dep) {
          return SystemJS.import(dep);
        })
      ).then(function () {
        performance.mark('atl:first_batch_dependencies_loaded');
      });

      if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistrations().then(function(workers) {
          workers.forEach(function(worker) { worker.unregister(); })
        });
      }});
  };
  document.body.appendChild(hippo);

  handleSystemLoad = void 0;
}
  </script>
  <script async="" onload="handleSystemLoad()" src="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/tng/static/frontend/jspm_packages/system.822e0a71e40b.js">
  </script>
